intra_panel_references.rule_description: If India is selected in 'Select the process type' then value is 'DOM IN', if International is selected then value is 'INT'
Dropdown values are filtered based on the Account Group/Vendor Type selection
If Account Group/Vendor Type is ZDES, ZDOM, ZRPV, or ZONE then derived as 'Domestic'. If ZIMP, ZSTV, or ZDAS then derived as 'Import'
If 'Select the process type' is India then Country is 'India' and non-editable. If International then Country is a selectable dropdown
Derived from Country selection using reference table 1.1 column 5
Derived from Country selection using reference table 1.1 column 2
Dropdown values filtered by Process Type (DOM IN or INT) from reference table 1.2
Mobile Number validation is based on Country selection

intra_panel_references.reference_context: Visible and Mandatory if Address proof is chosen as 'Electricity bill copy'
intra_panel_references.logic_text: Visible and Mandatory if Is GST present is selected as No and Address proof is chosen as 'Electricity bill copy' otherwise invisible and non-mandatory. If is GST present is Yes then Non mandatory and invisible.

intra_panel_references.reference_context: Visible and Mandatory if Address proof is chosen as 'Aadhaar copy'
intra_panel_references.logic_text: Visible and Mandatory if Is GST present is selected as No and Address proof is chosen as 'Aadhaar copy' otherwise invisible and non-mandatory. If is GST present is Yes then Non mandatory and invisible.

intra_panel_references.reference_context: Visible and Mandatory if Address proof is chosen as 'Aadhaar copy'
intra_panel_references.logic_text: Visible and Mandatory if Is GST present is selected as No and Address proof is chosen as 'Aadhaar copy' otherwise invisible and non-mandatory. If is GST present is Yes then Non mandatory and invisible.

intra_panel_references.reference_context: If Aadhaar is uploaded then get the data from Aadhaar OCR
intra_panel_references.logic_text: If GST uploaded then copy the data from GST field and Non-Mandatory, Non-Editable. If GST is not uploaded then it is mandatory. If Aadhaar is uploaded then get the data from Aadhaar OCR and non-editable. If Electricity bill is uploaded then user will enter the data

depends_on.logic_excerpt: If process type is India and Please choose the option is choose as Cancelled Cheque then it is visible and mandatory

depends_on.condition: Please choose the option == 'Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)'
depends_on.logic_excerpt: If Please the option is chosen as Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)then it is visible and mandatory

intra_panel_references.field_name: Please enter IFSC and Account Number manually

depends_on.condition: Please choose the option == 'Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)'
depends_on.logic_excerpt: Show this fields if passbook front page (India Domestic and International) is selected

depends_on.condition: Please choose the option == 'Cancelled Cheque' => non-editable; other options => editable
depends_on.logic_excerpt: Non editable if cancelled cheque is selected. Editable for other option

depends_on.condition: Please choose the option IN ['Cancelled Cheque (India Domestic)', 'Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)']
depends_on.logic_excerpt: Visible and mandatory for Cancelled Cheque (India Domestic) 2. Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International). Otherwise invisible and non-mandatory

depends_on.condition: Auto-derived from OCR when cheque is selected
depends_on.logic_excerpt: Auto-derived from OCR in case of cheque, manual entry in case of other options

depends_on.condition: Please choose the option == 'Cancelled Cheque' => non-editable; other options => editable
depends_on.logic_excerpt: Non editable if cancelled cheque is selected. Editable for other option

depends_on.condition: Please choose the option IN ['Cancelled Cheque (India Domestic)', 'Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)']
depends_on.logic_excerpt: Visible and mandatory for Cancelled Cheque (India Domestic) 2. Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International). Otherwise invisible and non-mandatory

depends_on.condition: Auto-derived from OCR when cheque is selected

OCR extracts Account Number from cheque image

reference_details.raw_expression: If yes, Vendor will upload MSME Certificate and OCR will be performed post upload. Upload size is 15Mb
If no, Vendor will upload MSME Declaration (Not Mandatory)

source_fields.reference_context: If duplicate vendor found based on Duplicate GST
If duplicate vendor found based on PAN Card
If duplicate vendor found based on Email Id
If duplicate vendor found based on Mobile Number
If duplicate vendor found based on Bank Account Number

intra_panel_references.logic_description: Exception Duplicate Vendor creation becomes mandatory if duplicate vendor is found based on any of: 1. Duplicate GST, 2. PAN Card, 3. Email Id, 4. Mobile Number, 5. Bank Account Number (and 6. Business Registration Number for Import/International)

intra_panel_references.dependency_description: Customer Code visibility and mandatory status depends on Is Vendor Your Customer? dropdown value
intra_panel_references.logic_text: If YES, then visible and mandatory, else hidden. (Need discussion on the logic. Can we derive using a dropdown field)

conditions.effect: Customer Code is visible and mandatory

conditions.condition: Is Vendor Your Customer? = NO or empty
